Question: Which of the following statements are true about the movie 'The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen' (2003) in relation to H.G. Wells's 'The War of the Worlds'?
Options:
A. The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen includes characters from H.G. Wells's works.
B. The events of The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen are set entirely in a fictional universe.
C. The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen takes part in events of H.G. Wells's The War of the Worlds.
D. H.G. Wells appears as a character in The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen.
Answer: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen includes characters from H.G. Wells's works., The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen takes part in events of H.G. Wells's The War of the Worlds.
